LanguageData.Gas_USAcidGas.label: Acid Gas
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_AcidGas.label: Acid Gas Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_AcidGas.description: Grenade that applies Acid gas. The chemicals associated with this grenade will cause irritation and pain, chemical acid burns and significantly effect breathing.
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_AcidGas.verbs.0.label: throw acid gas grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_USAcidGas.label: Acid Gas Grenade
LanguageData.Shell_USAcidGas.label: Acid Gas shell
LanguageData.Shell_USAcidGas.description: A pressurized shell filled with acid gas. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_USAcidGas.label: Acid Gas shell
LanguageData.TrapIED_USAcidGas.label: IED Acid Gas trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_USAcidGas.description: A pair of acid gas shells connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
